data.title: Best Gyro I've ever had!
data.text: We just had our second visit at Athineon and were just as pleased as the first visit!  The food is so deliciously prepared, and the owners are lovely!  We really enjoy supporting local places who place a high value on authenticity and quality.  This is truly evident in their offerings.  I haven't had better Greek food anywhere in California!

data.title: Good food found by mistake
data.text: We arrived in Berkeley  just after the lunch hour and found this place while walking University Ave. Busy, but not crowded. Seating limited to perhaps 10 tables. There appeared to be more tables in the back of the room. Some for two and the rest for four. Menu is strictly Greek with quite a few offerings for such a small place. The only American dish offered is a hamburger. We ordered at the register and took seats. Our meals, a Gyro and a veggie Falafel, came quickly. Both had good flavor and were served hot. The restaurant does a lot of take out business, so it obviously popular with the locals. Our server came by at least twice the check on us. I will go back again when in Berkeley.

data.title: OK food
data.text: The restaurant first looks a bit outdated. The table outside is most likely not worth considering as it is directly on University Avenue, the most busy Berkeley street with public buses and a lot of delivery trucks. Inside it is OK, at least the tables are covered with decent plastic covers, not the cheap paper covers. You have to order at the counter and the meals will then be brought to your table. The staff was friendly, the ordering process quick. The gyro plate was OK. So if you are into Greek food, you can go here but should not expect a terrific experience.

data.title: Decent meal
data.text: Though I am very picky about my Greek food this place may not have exceeded my expectations but it was still very good. The staff was friendly. It was not busy when I visited so I had perhaps a better experience than others I have talk to. Some of the food we got was a little dry for my taste but some of the people I was with very much enjoyed it. Like so many cuisines, the quality of Greek food is definitely dependent on each individual and their own pallet. Some people like it one way and others another. I would certainly revisit but it is not at the top of my list.

data.title: Offen oder nicht, dass ist hier die Frage !
data.text: Keine Oeffnungszeiten online, keine Hinweise auf Oeffnungszeiten waehrend der Feiertage. Beim Anruf, nur das Versprechen, dass man sich umgehen meldet. NICHTS ! Dann fahren wir 60 Miles um Gyro zu essen und die Huette war dicht. Klasse - KEIN Kundenservice, also kann er sein Gyros behalten....
